replies.msg: 點解我次次潛完水上嚟都係新post開咗唔夠五分鐘

Last Sunday my friend Joe married Stephanie, his girlfriend from high school. They were married by a pastor in Rosewood hotel. I said "wishing you a lifetime of love and happiness." My elder brother wrote "best wishes on this wonderful journey as you build your new lives together" My younger brother wrote "thank you for letting us share in this joyful day. We wish you all the best as you embark on this wonderful union" My sister wrote "congratulations on finding each other. Your greatest adventure has just begun!" My cousin said "wishing you fulfillment of every dream" Do you believe in horoscope? What zodiac sign are you? To me the personality description at times seems correct but I don't believe in the foretelling. I'm a Leo. Tell me more about the disposition and personality traits typical of a Leo. I want to see if they're accurate. Are you into mediation as well? Today many people practise zen meditation in pursuit of happiness and tranquility. Joe honours his parents and is thankful for what they've done for him. His brother is also a good son whereas his sister needs to be a better daughter. In the east teachers and parents stress the importance of filial piety which means chinese parental respect. They teach that you should honour your parents and take care of them. Recently Joe's cousin has stolen his Chanel watchband. It became a question of honour to tell him about it. My brother too felt honour bound to tell him. His dad is a man of honor and great integrity. Both Joe and I are kickboxing fans. Fred will be fighting in January for the heavyweight title for the honour of his country. Winning it is a matter of personal honour, family honour and national honour. Last month his church held a banquet in honour of Fred. Joe asked if I would do him the honour of accompanying him to the banquet which I did. It was a great honour to see fred. When he saw us he said humbly "it's a signal honour to have you here joe" We asked him whether he would do us the honour of being our sambo coach. He said "we'll have to see" A couple waiters did the honours and greeted the guests at the door. After we sat down Fred said to the waitress "will you do the honours and cut us a piece of chicken?" Fred said to us "I would be honoured if you could come and see my fight in january" We gave him an affirmative response. Last year Dana said to him "I would be honoured if you attended the hall of fame ceremony" which he did. He was honoured for his performance in his last match. Besides winning the championship he was honoured with an award for excellence in grappling. By the way many people bought front row tickets for the next kickboxing events at half price or less due to a computer error but the company stated that they would honour these tickets nonetheless which could cost a million dollars in lost earnings.
十分鐘都冇人開又要喺度吹下
